Name: Run Runbook
Description:
This step will kick off a runbook.  Right now it has two limitations. 

1) The runbook will start right away.  
2) It can pass values for prompted variables to the runbook.  But those variables have to be text or sensitive variables.  Variable types such as AWS or Azure accounts will not work.
Author: octopusbob

Parameters.Name: Run.Runbook.Name
Parameters.Label: Runbook Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the runbook to run.

Parameters.Name: Run.Runbook.Base.Url
Parameters.Label: Base Url
Parameters.HelpText: The base URL of your instance, IE https://samples.octopus.app

Parameters.Name: Run.Runbook.Api.Key
Parameters.Label: Api Key
Parameters.HelpText: The API key of a user who has permissions to run the runbook specified

Parameters.Name: Run.Runbook.Environment.Name
Parameters.Label: Environment Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of environment to run the runbook in

Parameters.Name: Run.Runbook.Tenant.Name
Parameters.Label: Tenant Name
Parameters.HelpText: (Optional) Name of Tenant to run the runbook for

Parameters.Name: Run.Runbook.UsePublishedSnapShot
Parameters.Label: Use Published Snapshot
Parameters.HelpText: Indicates if the run should use the most recent published snapshot.  When not set it will use the most recent snapshot, regardless if it was published or not.

Parameters.Name: Run.Runbook.Waitforfinish
Parameters.Label: Wait for finish
Parameters.HelpText: Indicates if the process should be paused and wait for the runbook to finish

Parameters.Name: Run.Runbook.UseGuidedFailure
Parameters.Label: Use Guided Failure
Parameters.HelpText: Should the runbook run use guided failure (not a good idea if you are waiting for this to finish)

Parameters.Name: Run.Runbook.PromptedVariables
Parameters.Label: Prompted Variable Values
Parameters.HelpText:
Values for any prompted variables for the runbook.  Each new line represents a new variable.  This will only work with string variable types, text and sensitive values.    

Use the format **Name::Value**  IE:


PromptedVariableName::My Super Awesome Value

OtherPromptedVariable::Other Super Awesome Value
